properties.description: Situated moments away from Battersea Park this is a most charming two bedroom period apartment set over two floors and has its own private roof terrace.

Indulge in luxurious living with this stunning 2 bed, 2 bath apartment with a private winter garden situated on the 13th floor of the Foster & Partners designed Battersea Roof Gardens building in Phase 3 of the Battersea Power Station development in Nine Elms, London.

location.address: Battersea Roof Gardens. Electric Boulevard, Battersea Power Station

properties.description: A spacious contemporary detached house built by Lifestyle Projects approximately 20 years ago in a great location near Wimbledon Village and within walking distance of the town centre and transport facilities

location.address: St Mary's Road, Wimbledon Village, SW19

properties.description: Located within a desirable modern apartment building behind private gates and spread over two floors, this superb duplex apartment offers almost 1,600 sqft of living space. Benefitting from direct access to a beautifully maintained communal garden and also a private underground parking space.

location.address: The Clockhouse, 4 Windmill Road, London, SW19

properties.description: Welcome to your perfect family home in a quiet residential corner of Furzedown. This newly renovated 5-bedroom house, in the heart of Furzedown and within close proximity of Tooting Broadway this offers the best of suburban tranquillity and urban convenience.

James Pendleton take great pleasure introducing to the market an immaculately presented first floor Victorian conversion flat located on a sought after road in the heart of Wandsworth Common. The property offers a mixture of contemporary and period features throughout the flat.

location.address: St James's Drive, Wandsworth Common, London, SW17

properties.description: Perfect as a family home, this three bedroom semi-detached house offers a spacious double reception, a well-fitted kitchen, conservatory, family bathroom, additional shower room and a well-maintained garden with an annexe.
